com.cmput301w19t12.bookbuddies

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w19t12.bookbuddies.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Transaction class represents a book transaction between two users A book transaction has an owner, borrower, location, book and time

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      User owner 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void completeBorrow()
      complete the borrow process by moving the book from accepted to borrowed and closing the current transaction and then opening a return transaction for when the book is to be returned
      void completeReturn()
      complete the return process by moving the book from borrowed to available and closing this transaction
      Book getBook()
      Gets the book involved in the transaction
      User getBorrower()
      Gets the borrower user of the transaction
      boolean getBorrowerScanned()
      returns borrowerScanned
      MyLatLng getLocation()
      Gets the location of the transaction
      User getOwner()
      Get the owner user of the transaction
      boolean getOwnerScanned()
      returns ownerScanned
      java.util.Date getTime()
      Gets the time of the transaction
      java.lang.String getTransactionID() 
      java.lang.String getTransactionType() 
      boolean hasBorrowerScanned()
      returns the firebase value of borrowerScanned in firebase for this transaction, and also updates the local variable
      boolean hasOwnerScanned()
      returns the firebase value of ownerScanned in firebase for this transaction, and also updates the local variable
      void setBook(Book book)
      Sets the book involved in the transaction
      void setBorrower(User borrower)
      Sets the borrower user of the transaction
      void setBorrowerScanned(boolean bool)
      sets borrowerScanned
      void setLocation(MyLatLng location)
      Sets the location of the transaction
      void setOwner(User owner)
      Sets the owner user of the transaction
      void setOwnerScanned(boolean bool)
      sets ownerScanned
      void setTime(java.util.Date time)
      Sets the time of the transaction
      void setTransactionID(java.lang.String id) 
      void setTransactionType(java.lang.String transactionType) 
      boolean transactionComplete()
      check if both users have scanned the book detailed in this transaction
      void transactionToDatabase()
      write the transaction to firebase
